amendment.description: An amendment printed in Part A of House Report 117-432 to require the Secretary of HHS to enter into an agreement with the National Academies (or another appropriate entity) to conduct a study on the relationship between COVID-19 and rates of morbidity and mortality as a result of heart disease.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pallone amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A002) and the bill pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Pallone.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pallone amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Pallone amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
